name: Car Dealership Simulator
description:
Car Dealership Simulator is an extremely comprehensive and detailed car dealership business simulation game.


Car Dealership Simulator contains detailed car buying and selling mechanics. Buy, price, clean and sell your cars.
Upgrade, improve, keep your car dealership clean and earn the respect of your customers, be the best car dealer around!


Keep your cars clean and earn the respect of customers.


Keep your environment clean! otherwise you can run away customers.


Every customer comes with different pricing, don't sell your car now and don't miss the next deals!!
